title: Jhin's q (dancing grenade)  disappearing
body: When using the Q it hits 2 minions then goes away like it was finished after the 4th.

replies.body:
Hey Bladesmith! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix. ^-^
That's true, and it happends pretty often.

I had this happening a lot in my games as well. It hits all four every once and a while, but sometimes it just disappears after 2 or three hits, even though there is an unhit minion right next to one.
